Residential Proxies

Data is key in all business areas – and HTTP/SOCKS5 residential proxies can provide secure and anonymous access to the data of any major platform. If you’re looking to buy residential IP addresses that are optimized for reliability, high performance, and maximum uptime, contact Infatica today!

Largest and most reliable Residential Proxy network

Power your web scraping projects with rotating Residential Proxies from a pool of 100M+ IPs. With a worldwide coverage of Residential IP addresses, you can easily overcome geo-location blocks.

What you get with our Residential proxy network

Residential proxies are a network of intermediaries that enhance your anonymity and online security. Each IP address is sourced from local all across the globe – this allows you global access to any website for easy data collection.

  • 99,9% uptime and maximum performance

    Enjoy a reliable and fast connection and unlimited concurrent sessions that never let you down. Infatica’s fastest residential proxies guarantee a 99,9% uptime and deliver maximum performance for your web scraping needs.

  • Avoid CAPTCHAs, IP address bans, and other anti-scraping measures

    Access any website without triggering any anti-scraping measures. You can avoid CAPTCHAs, IP bans, and other obstacles by using real IPs from real users across the globe.

  • Millions of IPs in major cities across Americas, Europe, and Asia

    Utilize a wide range of IPs from millions of devices in major cities across Americas, Europe, and Asia. You can choose the best location for your target website and switch IPs as often as you want.

Why Customers Prefer Infatica Residential Proxies

  • Go global

    Actionable public web data is spread across different regions, countries, and cities – but procuring it is sometimes impossible due to various geo-restrictions. For e-commerce businesses and price aggregators, entering local markets is vital – but their opportunities for collecting public web data are often limited.

    Infatica’s residential proxies solve this issue via geo-targeting, offering a set of major cities in the Americas, Europe, and Asia – now you can scrape local data using real user IPs to create marketing strategies, perform search engine optimization, and more.

  • Easy-to-use – yet powerful

    Proxies are used by countless companies worldwide – and they have to be accessible to both regular business owners and power users who buy residential IPs to work with crucial public web data.

    Infatica residential proxy network can be managed via an easy-to-use web interface, which features traffic dashboards, quickstart guides, product & service overviews, and more. For power users requiring more fine-tuning capacities, Infatica offers a proxy management API for better scalability and refined control.

  • Less CAPTCHAs, more data

    All major tech ecosystems understand the importance of their data – and their security practices are built around safeguarding it. A good example is anti-bot systems like reCAPTCHA and Cloudflare, which use a number of factors (including IP addresses) to categorize real users and scrapers. The former enjoy zero IP blocks – and the latter face all sorts of roadblocks, including CAPTCHAs and region blocks.

  • Reliability you can count on

    Data collection, cybersecurity tests, search engine optimization, and similar activities all have to run without interruptions to stay efficient. A single proxy error may lead to missed data points and fail the entire operation.
    Infatica engineers work to improve our stable residential proxy service even further: We’ve managed to build a reliable server infrastructure that boasts 99,9% uptime, low response time, and high request success rate – this allows our clients to gather data using real user IPs without a hiccup.
